attributes.action: Compensation for price fixing oil prices
attributes.additional_details:
This petition is brought about by the revelation that all the big Oil Companies have been found out to be price fixing for over ten years, prices have more than doubled in that time meaning on average if you spend £100 per week on diesel or petrol these companies over a ten year period have fraudulently stolen upto and above £25000 off each and every one of you.
Sign this petition and please share with other so as the big companies named ie ESSO and SHE'LL and others can be brought to justice and forced to compensate each and every one of us.
